name: Blaster Dozer
description:
A short game I made back in 2018. Outer space of attacking aliens are coming to you, your a spaceship that has to shoot all of the aliens, there three levels in this games, there are powerups that can shoot more missiles, when you get shot by the alien the game is over, Your out to space stop aliens! Are you ready?

Created by Brian Kirsch

2018 ©ARvision
